00020 // 12-Jan-2009  John Aynsley  Bug fix. sc_time argument to notify should be const
00021 // 20-Mar-2009  John Aynsley  Add cancel_all() method
00022 
00023 
00024 #ifndef __PEQ_WITH_GET_H__
00025 #define __PEQ_WITH_GET_H__
00026 
00027 #include <systemc>
00028 //#include <tlm>
00029 #include <map>
00030 
00031 namespace tlm_utils {
00032 
00033 template <class PAYLOAD>
00034 class peq_with_get : public sc_core::sc_object
00035 {
00036 public:
00037   typedef PAYLOAD transaction_type;
00038   typedef std::pair<const sc_core::sc_time, transaction_type*> pair_type;
00039 
00040 public:
00041   peq_with_get(const char* name) : sc_core::sc_object(name)
00042   {
00043   }
00044 
00045   void notify(transaction_type& trans, const sc_core::sc_time& t)
00046   {
00047     m_scheduled_events.insert(pair_type(t + sc_core::sc_time_stamp(), &trans));
00048     m_event.notify(t);
00049   }
00050 
00051   void notify(transaction_type& trans)
00052   {
00053     m_scheduled_events.insert(pair_type(sc_core::sc_time_stamp(), &trans));
00054     m_event.notify(); // immediate notification
00055   }
00056 
00057   // needs to be called until it returns 0
00058   transaction_type* get_next_transaction()
00059   {
00060     if (m_scheduled_events.empty()) {
00061       return 0;
00062     }
00063 
00064     sc_core::sc_time now = sc_core::sc_time_stamp();
00065     if (m_scheduled_events.begin()->first <= now) {
00066       transaction_type* trans = m_scheduled_events.begin()->second;
00067       m_scheduled_events.erase(m_scheduled_events.begin());
00068       return trans;
00069     }
00070 
00071     m_event.notify(m_scheduled_events.begin()->first - now);
00072 
00073     return 0;
00074   }
00075 
00076   sc_core::sc_event& get_event()
00077   {
00078     return m_event;
00079   }
00080 
00081   // Cancel all events from the event queue
00082   void cancel_all() {
00083     m_scheduled_events.clear();
00084     m_event.cancel();
00085   }
00086 
00087 private:
00088   std::multimap<const sc_core::sc_time, transaction_type*> m_scheduled_events;
00089   sc_core::sc_event m_event;
00090 };
00091 
00092 }
00093 
00094 #endif
